Excellent Torrent, works perfectly once downloaded, no Crack Needed, just install and run.

I Have Windows 7 64-bits version, Nvidia GT545 Graphic Card and I7 Intel Core Processor.

Also... havent had any crashes or anything, if you feel the game a bit laggy just lower the graphics!

Those who are getting "It is not found any file specified for ISArcextract" error download and install FreeARC

Ah, turns out I was playing from Farcry3.exe instead of farcry3_d3d11.exe. Works now. Great upload!

When I close and re open FC3 it wont load any of my saves but I still have my save files in the location where they are created. Any solutions?

Fucking great, Had good progress into the game a solid 30 hours or so and then the game crashes and my saves get erased.... Any fixes or is this just ubisoft deserving a motherfucking dildo up the ass?

The saves aren't erased, they're sitting in c:ProgramDataOrbit46 problem is that they don't show when restarting. 

One suggestion was to start FarCry 3 in "offline" mode (add -offline to the exe shortcut) and someone claimed this worked (here: http://www.spielsucht24.de/2012/12/01/far-cry-3-save-game-problem-fix-solved/ ) but this did not work for me. Maybe someone else has more luck?

I can confirm that this game works on Windows 8. If you run farcry3_d3d11.exe as an administrator and under Windows 7 compatibility, there are no save errors or crashes.
